headline: Evaluating Edison International After Wildfire Risk Moves and a 24.9% Share Price Slide
summary: If you are wondering whether Edison International is quietly turning into a value opportunity, you are not alone. This stock has started to look more interesting to investors who focus on price versus fundamentals. The share price has inched up about 1.7% over the last week and 2.6% over the last month, even though it is still down roughly 24.9% year to date and about 20.2% over the last 12 months, a mix that often signals shifting expectations around risk and future returns.
